version_description: Minor bug fix for editing custom users
Minor bug fixes
Minor changes.

-Additional bug fixes and performance optimization.
-Direct Messaging has been temporarily removed while we work to expand its functionality with new, exciting features.

-We've added a comprehensive FAQ section to the Support tab within Settings.
-You can also clear a Romantic 'Past Partner' by opening the list on a Romantic Pattern page.
-All notifications from friends are now stored, however, please make sure you 'Bookmark' any Daily Pattern Reminders you'd like to save.
-Login and Daily Pattern Reminder bug fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Minor changes.

There are many much needed bug fixes in this version! There should no longer be any issues with creating an account or finding your city. We have added a non-binary gender selection in on-boarding and for creating a custom contact. We have added the ability to make your profile private - just go to settings to turn this on.

We have added an Update section in which we will be sending you updates throughout the day about you, your timing, your friends, friendships, romantic relationships, and more. We have also given you the ability to “Like” content throughout the app as well as posts people have made in the Update section. You can also share content with friends in the Update section.
Minor bug fixes and improvements in the feed an friends list
Minor bug fixes and improvements
Minor bug fixes and improvements
Minor bug fixes and improvements

New Notifications option in the menu, which allows you to see recent activity.

Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Fixes several issues for users with iOS 10

- Post photos to your feed
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thanks for using The Pattern! We’re excited to share a few new features to make your experience on The Pattern even better.

WHAT’S NEW:

-Direct message your friends on The Pattern.
-Bookmark your favorite posts for easy access.
-Add your own private notes to Pattern updates and insights, making it easier to track things currently happening in your life, or set intentions.

Thanks for using The Pattern! We’re excited to introduce a whole new look and feel to the app, along with few new features to make your experience on The Pattern even better.

WHAT’S NEW:

-Posts that you react to will no longer appear in the feed automatically, allowing you to be selective with which posts you share to your feed.
-Direct message your friends on The Pattern. Make sure you activate the direct messaging feature to have direct message conversations with friends on The Pattern.
-Bookmark your favorite posts for easy access.
-Add your own private notes to Pattern updates, making it easier to track things currently happening in your life, or set intentions.

We hope you enjoy!

-We’ve improved the map functionality, allowing you to zoom in on specific locations when entering your own birth location, or creating Custom Profiles.
-Reactions to personal insights or content shared to the Feed will no longer be visible to other users, with the exception of World Updates.
-Additional bug fixes and optimization to further improve your experience on The Pattern!
Additional bug fixes and optimization to further improve your experience on The Pattern!
Additional bug fixes and optimization to further improve your experience on The Pattern!

Customize which friends you’d like us to send insights about. Tap the new star icon on their Pattern profile, or from your Friends List to include them in your friend insight updates.

We’ve also made it easier to deselect current Romantic Partners. Tap the active Romantic icon on their Pattern profile, or from your Friends List.

Follow @ThePattern on Instagram and Twitter!

-Sign up or login to your account with an email address, mobile number, or Connect with Facebook
-Secure your account by adding a secondary login (Email, Mobile #, Facebook)
-Customize your notifications with new notification panel in Settings
-Ability to delete or deactivate account from within the app
-Contacts automatically refresh, making it easier to see which of your friends have recently joined The Pattern
-Ability to clear past romantic partners from Pattern recognition
-Additional bug fixes
-Follow @ThePattern on Instagram and Twitter!
Bug fixes and performance optimizations

-Additional bug fixes and performance optimization.
-Direct Messaging has been temporarily removed while we work to expand its functionality with new, exciting features.

-We've added a comprehensive FAQ section to the Support tab within Settings.
-You can also clear a Romantic 'Past Partner' by opening the list on a Romantic Pattern page.
-All notifications from friends are now stored, however, please make sure you 'Bookmark' any Daily Pattern Reminders you'd like to save.
-Login and Daily Pattern Reminder bug fixes.

-We've added a comprehensive FAQ section to the Support tab within Settings.
-You can also clear a Romantic 'Past Partner' by opening the list on a Romantic Pattern page.
-All notifications from friends are now stored, however, please make sure you 'Bookmark' any Daily Pattern Reminders you'd like to save.
-Login and Daily Pattern Reminder bug fixes.

-New custom @handles on The Pattern! We're making it even easier to find friends on The Pattern with new custom handles. Choose your own @username during the sign-up process and change it any time within your Profile Settings.
-You can now reactivate your account from within the app.
-Additional bugs fixes and optimization.

-Updated for optimal performance on iOS 13
-New custom @handles on The Pattern! We're making it even easier to find friends on The Pattern with new custom handles. Choose your own @username during the sign-up process and change it any time within your Profile Settings.
-You can now reactivate your account from within the app.
-Additional bugs fixes and optimization.

-Updated for optimal performance on iOS 13, including a fix for users with "Dark Mode" enabled
-New custom @handles on The Pattern! We're making it even easier to find friends on The Pattern with new custom handles. Choose your own @username during the sign-up process and change it any time within your Profile Settings.
-You can now reactivate your account from within the app.
-Additional bugs fixes and optimization.

-Updated for optimal performance on iOS 13, including a fix for users with "Dark Mode" enabled, and a fix for users using Facebook to log in
-New custom @handles on The Pattern! We're making it even easier to find friends on The Pattern with new custom handles. Choose your own @username during the sign-up process and change it any time within your Profile Settings.
-You can now reactivate your account from within the app.
-Additional bugs fixes and optimization.

Introducing Shared Experiences!

While many of us have Shared Patterns, they may manifest themselves differently in our individual lives. Share your personal experiences with specific Pattern Traits or Timing Cycles and learn about those of other members of The Pattern community.

Shared Experiences remind us that we are all connected. Our intention is for Shared Experiences to be a safe space for all to engage with one another. We ask that you treat everyone with respect, honesty, and kindness.

Introducing Shared Experiences!

Introducing Shared Experiences!

While many of us have Shared Patterns, they may manifest themselves differently in our individual lives. Share your personal experiences with specific Pattern Traits or Timing Cycles and learn about those of other members of The Pattern community.

Shared Experiences remind us that we are all connected. Our intention is for Shared Experiences to be a safe space for all to engage with one another. We ask that you treat everyone with respect, honesty, and kindness.

With this update, we've included an additional privacy feature: blocking. You may now block individuals, which prevents them from from adding you as a friend, viewing Your Pattern, or reading anything you post in Shared Experiences.

About Shared Experiences:

Shared Experiences remind us that we're all connected. While 'Your Pattern' is unique to you, many of us share specific pattern traits with people all around the world. This new feature provides a safe space to share the ways in which individual traits affect each of us, and to learn from the experiences of others. We ask that you treat everyone with respect, and kindness

We've added new features to Shared Experiences, including the ability to sort through posts, and the option to allow replies to your post.

Replies: You can now continue the conversation with The Pattern community by replying to specific Shared Experiences posts.
Sort posts: Select between Most Recent, Trending, or posts published by Friends Only.

We've added new features to Shared Experiences, including the ability to sort through posts, and the option to allow replies to your post.

Replies: You can now continue the conversation with The Pattern community by replying to specific Shared Experiences posts.
Sort posts: Select between Most Recent, Trending, or posts published by Friends Only.

Thanks for being a part of The Pattern community! Here's what's included in our latest release:

-New Shared Patterns badges: We've made it easier to identify and view the patterns you share with a friend by tapping the Shared Patterns badge on any friend's profile.
-More Things to Know about your friends: Learn more about your relationship with a particular friend by tapping the refresh icon on the bottom right side of the Things to Know box.
-Improvements to the design and layout of Your Pattern and Friend Pattern profiles.
-Additional performance optimization to make your experience on The Pattern even better.

Thanks for being a part of The Pattern community! Here's what's included in our latest release:

-New Shared Patterns badges: We've made it easier to identify and view the patterns you share with a friend by tapping the Shared Patterns badge on any friend's profile.
-More Things to Know about your friends: Learn more about your relationship with a particular friend by tapping the refresh icon on the bottom right side of the Things to Know box.
-Improvements to the design and layout of Your Pattern and Friend Pattern profiles.
-Additional performance optimization to make your experience on The Pattern even better.

Thanks for using The Pattern!

With this update, you can now request a download of your personal data from the Settings menu of your account.
This version also includes additional bug fixes and performance optimizations.
Thanks for using The Pattern! This update brings performance improvements and enhancements

Thanks for being a part of The Pattern community!

With this update, we've refreshed the Friends tab, making it easier to search for anyone on The Pattern. We've also made it easier to differentiate between your friends and custom profiles.

Leave your friends a comment: You can now add comments to your friend's posts on The Pattern.

We're excited to reveal the newest addition to The Pattern: Bonds!

Explore your unique compatibility with friends & romantic interests.

Gain valuable insights about your most important relationships - or those of your favorite public figures.

Understanding the various dynamics of your Bonds empowers you to approach your relationships with more thoughtful communication & empathy.

Beta version of our brand new Connect feature is now available for California with staged rollout for the US to follow. Waiting room is available for select cities with new cities added regularly.
